refnamediv.refpurpose: Displays the rotation and fallback angles, surface area, and plane equation for each face of the ARB specified on the command line. The total surface area, volume, and the length of each edge are also displayed.

refsection.para: The analyze command displays the rotation and fallback angles, surface area, and plane equation for each face of the ARB specified on the command line. The total surface area, volume, and the length of each edge are also displayed. If executed while editing an ARB, the arb_name may be omitted, and the ARB being edited will be analyzed.
The example shows how to display information about an ARB's rotation and fallback angles, surface area, and plane equation for its face. Edge information is also displayed.

example.para: Rotation and fallback angles, surface area, and plane equation for each face of the ARB specified on the command line are displayed along with edge information.

refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
